p: Ocimum sanctum L. is a small tree, up to 1 m tall, commonly known as ‘Sacred basil’ or ‘Holy basil’ or “Hương Nhu Tía” in Vietnam, is grown as a household plant in many countries for medicinal purposes like Vietnam and India ( Figure 13). It belongs to the Lamiaceae family. The whole plant has a pleasant aroma [ 123, 124].
